content: i have to admit that i have a weakness for those fantastic skeins of wollmeise lace yarn with their vivid shades and wonderful color combinations and although collecting yarns is a separate hobby i was itching to knit something special with them after some trial and error i came up with hera the pattern construction consists of short row which will arrange the colors in a unique way and make them pop you will need around 1590m 1740 yards of lace weight the shawl will grow quite a bit in length after washing and blocking finished size is about 55 by 190 cm **update ** i have added a second version of the pattern named hera 16 5 2025 pdf this pattern is slightly altered to accommodate the colorways of urth yarns uneek fingering this version requires three skeins of yarn to produce a shawl sized approximately 75 / 190 cm x 12 5 /32 cm
